FuncDef:
The group command creates a peer group.
The undo group command deletes a peer group. The group command creates a peer group. The undo group command deletes a peer group. By default, no peer group is created.
ParentView: BGP-VPN instance view,BGP multi-instance VPN instance session view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a peer group.
The value is a string of 1 to 47 case-sensitive characters and cannot contain spaces. If the character string is quoted by double quotation marks, the character string can contain spaces.
